overview: Hot body Hard Heroes Clint Peak (Hero Hawk), Derek Cruz (Hero Burst), and muscular Troy Michaels (Hero Tron) are all three captured by international energy terrorist... The Hand in their attempt to bring him to justice. Beaten, exhibited, electronically collar controlled, and humiliated, the Hero hunks serve as muscular pain slaves for the amusement of The Hand. Sexy and colorful comic book Hero action.
title: The Hand (HardHeroes Vol. 10)
